body: Wait... How did her classmates know about her licking feet???

Damn... The plot's pretty amazing and the art's beautiful as well... Prolly one of the best yuri I've read. 

Added to Favorites~ ♡

@hornytoad
Absolutely. It's one of the things that annoys me the most about this site. The only way I manage to find stuff like this is by excluding tags like rape and netorare with a minus in the search. But thats not always a guarantee to find romance stories, it just increases the chance to find stories like this.
This was beautiful. I really wish there was a 'romance' or 'love' tag so it would be easier to find gems like this.
